Package org.apache.daffodil.japi

Class Compiler

java.lang.Object
org.apache.daffodil.japi.Compiler
public class Compiler extends Object
Compile DFDL schemas into ProcessorFactory's or reload saved parsers into DataProcessor's.

Do not use the Compiler constructor to create a Compiler. Instead, use Daffodil.compiler().

    • Compiler

  • Method Details

    • compileFile

      public ProcessorFactory compileFile(File schemaFile) throws IOException
      Compile DFDL schema file into a ProcessorFactory

      To allow jar-file packaging, (where schema files might be part of a jar), it is recommended to use compileSource(java.net.URI) instead.

      Parameters:
      schemaFile - DFDL schema file used to create a ProcessorFactory.
      Returns:
      ProcessorFactory used to create DataProcessor(s). Must check WithDiagnostics.isError() before using it.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while reading the schemaFile

    • compileFile

      public ProcessorFactory compileFile(File schemaFile, String rootName, String rootNamespace) throws IOException
      Compile DFDL schema file into a ProcessorFactory

      To allow jar-file packaging, (where schema files might be part of a jar), it is recommended to use compileSource(java.net.URI) instead.

      Parameters:
      schemaFile - DFDL schema file used to create a ProcessorFactory.
      rootName - name of root element, or null to choose automatically from first element of schema.
      rootNamespace - String of namespace of the root element, or null to infer automatically when unambiguous. Pass "" (empty string) for No Namespace.*
      Returns:
      ProcessorFactory used to create DataProcessor(s). Must check WithDiagnostics.isError() before using it.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while reading the schemaFile

    • compileSource

      public ProcessorFactory compileSource(URI uri) throws IOException
      Compile DFDL schema source into a ProcessorFactory

      Parameters:
      uri - URI of DFDL schema file used to create a ProcessorFactory.
      Returns:
      ProcessorFactory used to create DataProcessor(s). Must check WithDiagnostics.isError() before using it.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while reading the uri

    • compileSource

      public ProcessorFactory compileSource(URI uri, String rootName, String rootNamespace) throws IOException
      Compile DFDL schema source into a ProcessorFactory

      Parameters:
      uri - URI of DFDL schema file used to create a ProcessorFactory.
      rootName - name of root element, or null to choose automatically from first element of schema.
      rootNamespace - String of namespace of the root element, or null to infer automatically when unambiguous. Pass "" (empty string) for No Namespace.
      Returns:
      ProcessorFactory used to create DataProcessor(s). Must check WithDiagnostics.isError() before using it.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while reading the uri

    • reload

      public DataProcessor reload(File savedParser) throws InvalidParserException
      Reload a saved parser from a file

      To allow jar-file packaging, (where the savedParser might be part of a jar), it is recommended to use the other version of reload(java.nio.channels.ReadableByteChannel) where the argument is a ReadableByteChannel for a saved parser.

      Parameters:
      savedParser - file of a saved parser, created with DataProcessor.save(java.nio.channels.WritableByteChannel)

      Returns:
      DataProcessor used to parse data. Must check WithDiagnostics.isError() before using it.

      Throws:
      InvalidParserException - if the file is not a valid saved parser.

    • reload

      public DataProcessor reload(ReadableByteChannel savedParser) throws InvalidParserException
      Reload a saved parser from a ReadableByteChannel

      Parameters:
      savedParser - ReadableByteChannel of a saved parser, created with DataProcessor.save(java.nio.channels.WritableByteChannel)

      Returns:
      DataProcessor used to parse data. Must check WithDiagnostics.isError() before using it.

      Throws:
      InvalidParserException - if the file is not a valid saved parser.

    • withTunable

      public Compiler withTunable(String tunable, String value)
      Create a new Compiler instance having a specific Daffodil tunable parameter value.

      Parameters:
      tunable - name of the tunable parameter
      value - value of the tunable parameter
      Returns:
      (undocumented)
      See Also:
      • Tunable Parameters - list of tunables names of default values

    • withTunables

      public Compiler withTunables(AbstractMap<String,String> tunables)
      Create a new Compiler instance having specific Daffodil tunable parameter values.

      Parameters:
      tunables - a map of key/value pairs, where the key is the tunable name and the value is the value it will get.
      Returns:
      (undocumented)
      See Also:
      • Tunable Parameters - list of tunables names of default values
